text: Came here often. Really pleased with the staffs and services. Today was greeted by a Auntie. She always stood outside shi li fang to promote the store. She makes friendly conversations and patiently explained about the promotions and proceed to direct me to take a seat. Inside, the manager and many staffs are very proactive. Always ready to assist me with the new digital ordering system. Previously, they had to use stamps for collect n redemption. Now is all points. Food wise, no complaints. Many options. Worth the price. Now alcohol beverages had been included. Some branches allow paywave payment. This one doesn't have paywave. Would come again by soon.

Review of Shi Li Fang Hot Pot @ Junction 10

Today, I went to Shi Li Fang Hot Pot at Junction 10 for a last-minute meal after seeing an online offer to book a table. All the food was excellent, and I especially enjoyed the option to make my own sauce. The drinks were limited to $1, but you can top up frequently without having to pay extra unless you want something more premium.

However, I found the ice cream disappointing; the flavor wasn’t strong and lacked aroma. I suggest improving the ice cream quality.

Thank you!

Shi Li Fang offers good and value meal steamboat package.
Their services and crew very attentive
Don’t expect their value meal to fill up your stomach if you are a big eater, that you need to eat buffet

If based on value meal, its good enough
Mei Wei is so polite and extremely good at her service. She is definitely any asset to the company. 50% before 5.30pm. Value for money. Damage $40+

Cheaper hotpot then HDL
Male staff was nice n friendly. Even the cashier male staff was nice to explain point reward system
